title: HDFC Credila raises USD 100 mn through ECB route for loan book expansion
description: DBS Bank's IFSC banking unit in Gujarat International Finance Tec-City (GIFT City) said in a statement that it led the syndicated loan. The funds will be used for growing the retail education loan franchise, it said.
